# [The John Brown House Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20250912013455/https://www.rihs.org/locations/the-john-brown-house-museum/)

More than a house, it is a space to explore Rhode Island's history.

### Today's Hours

10:00 am to 4:00 pm

# [Museum of Work & Culture ](http://web.archive.org/web/20250912013455/https://www.rihs.org/locations/museum-of-work-culture/)

The Museum of Work & Culture presents the compelling story of immigrants who sought a better life in the mill towns along the Blackstone River.
